column4: I wanted to switch to Ubuntu, but for that I need some packages. Namely, kernel 2.6.23 and alsa 1.0.15 Is there a way to get not the current kernel 2.6.24, but the 2.6.23.14?
the current ubuntu release uses kernel 2.6.22 and alsa 1.0.14
I meant I wanted to install the 7.10, but use some packages from 8.04
